plot: Randy plumber, Sid South (Christopher Neil), enjoys a profession which offers him ample opportunity to bed sexy housewives. In the third of the popular Adventures... series, our hero takes the plunge with a host of famous faces, including: Stephen Lewis and Willie Rushton.
title: Adventures of a Plumber's Mate
